page.title: 18TRADE
page.content: EVERY DAY OF THE WEEK EXCEPT SATURDAY AND SUNDAY THE UNITED CARRIERS ARE WORKING. THEY START ABOUT 8.00am AND FINISH ABOUT 6.OOpm AND THEN THE NIGHTSHIFT DRIVER TAKES THE EMPTY LORRY BACK TO IT'S BASE AND TAKES A FULL ONE BACK. THEY DELIVER BOXES TO SHOPS. SOME MILL WORKERS START WORK ABOUT 6.30am AND FINISH ABOUT 5.30pm AND THEN MORE COME AND FINISH AT ABOUT 9.00pm. THEY GET SHEEP WOOL IN AND WASH IT, THEN RINSE IT AND FINALLY DRY IT. THEN IT GETS DYED. AFTER BEING DYED THEY TAKE IT TO THE LOOMS WHERE IT GETS WEAVED. BRORA RANGERS HAVE A CLUB AND POOL TABLES etc. THEY USUALLY PLAY FOOTBALL ON SATURDAY AFTERNOON. TOMMY KNOX'S WORKERS DELIVER FOOD TO SHOPS. THEY ALSO DELIVER NEWSPAPERS.
